channel.title: Do the scores auto send?
channel.description:
i made an extemly simple script for tug-o-war and got 4182 and sent it but i didnt want a highscore cause im making a script that dos heaps of stuff like fortune wheel and stuff...so i tried to slow it down but i ended up getting 4200 lol and i was jus wondering do they send you and email or something cause i got nothing. lol hope i dnt get banned =P
if you could tell me it i would be very gratefull thankyou =)

item.title: Do the scores auto send?
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Some games (like Splat-a-Sloth) autosend, most don’t, though I don’t know about Tug-o-War. I don’t think it’s automatic though.

Read full topic

item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

I did not understand anything you just said. I got something about a score of 4182 and 4200 on a tug-o-war game. Something about dos? maybe does? and a script. Not sure why you would get banned for getting 18 more in your score.
